description:
Discover the secret "Hollywood" structure of stories you can adapt to your own story writing. Whatever you're creating, be it a novel, short story, assignment or script, this structure will ensure you keep your audience at the edge of their seat right til the very end.

Master The Art Of The Story Structure And Make Your Stories Impossible To Resist

  • 11 simple steps to story writing mastery,
  • follow through using "The Matrix" to explain how the structure works (SPOILERS included!)
  • quick and simple course, no BS, no fluff. Done in under an hour.
Spellbind Your Audiences And Have Them Beg To Know What Comes Next!
I've always loved story writing. I was one of those kids in school who won awards for creative writing. I loved writing and I still do. Growing up, I lost my way. Only recently have I begun to rediscover my love for writing stories.
I'm sharing with you a structure that I've researched that works. If you've ever wanted to write a great story, this course is for you. Use this course to write stories for business, an autobiography, sales presentation and watch as your audience succumbs to your storytelling magic.
Content and Overview
I've created this course for the time poor storyteller. There's no need to drag on and on. The 11 lectures are minutes long and to the point. You'll get it done in one sitting.
If you hate the sound of my voice, that's cool. I've compiled a sheet that you can check off as your going along too.
Share your stories with me too! I'd love to see how you go. Happy storytelling!
title: How To Write Irresistibly Compelling Stories
